# Predicates:
InternationalStudent(x) ::: x is an international student.
US(x) ::: x is in the US.
F1Visa(x) ::: x has an F1 visa.
J1Visa(x) ::: x has a J1 visa.
NeedsToApply(x, y) ::: x needs to apply for y.
CPT() ::: CPT.
OPT() ::: OPT.
Work(x) ::: x wants to work in the US.
Person(x) ::: x is a person.

# Premises:
Person(mike)
InternationalStudent(mike)
US(mike)

# International students in US have either an F1 visa or a J1 visa.
∀x (InternationalStudent(x) ∧ US(x) → F1Visa(x) ∨ J1Visa(x))

# An international student in US with an F1 visa needs to apply for CPT or OPT if the student wants to work in the US.
∀x ((InternationalStudent(x) ∧ US(x) ∧ F1Visa(x) ∧ Work(x)) → NeedsToApply(x, CPT()) ∨ NeedsToApply(x, OPT()))

# Mike needs to apply for CPT if he wants to work in the US.
